results.title: A phase 1 study of simvastatin in combination with topotecan and cyclophosphamide in pediatric patients with relapsed and/or refractory solid and CNS tumors.
results.text_hl: The most common diagnoses were @DISEASE_Neuroblastoma @DISEASE_MESH:D009447 @@@neuroblastoma@@@ (N = 4) and @<m>DISEASE_Sarcoma_Ewing</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012512 @@@Ewing sarcoma@@@ (N = 3).

A phase 1 study of simvastatin in combination with topotecan and cyclophosphamide in pediatric patients with relapsed and/or refractory solid and CNS tumors.
